resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81503</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81503</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4342</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Issue Tracking: Methodology for an Action Project</string>
            <string language="es">Seguimiento de problemas: Metodología para un proyecto de acción</string>
            <string language="ga">Leanúint Ábhar: Modheolaíocht do Thionscadal Gníomhaíochta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgabe Gleichlauf: Methodenlehre für ein 
Tätigkeit Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cheminement d'Issue : Méthodologie pour un
projet d'action</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seguir Da Edição: Metodologia para um 
projeto da ação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inseguimento Dell'Edizione: Metodologia per
un progetto di azione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζήτημα που ακολουθεί: Μεθοδολογία για ένα 
πρόγραμμα ενέργειας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Details of a methodology that students can use to follow and explore an issue or topic in newspapers, television or radio over a period of time (1-2 weeks).</string>
            <string language="es">Detalles de una metodología que los estudiantes puedan seguir y para que puedan explorar un tema o asunto en periódicos, televisión o radio durante un período de tiempo (1-2 semanas).</string>
            <string language="ga">Sonraí maidir le modheolaíocht ar féidir le daltaí a úsáid chun ábhar nó topaic atá sna nuachtáin, ar an teilifís nó ar an raidió a leanúint agus a fhiosrú thar tréimhse ama (1-2 seachtain).</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">CSPE</string>
            <string language="es">CSPE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSSP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Details einer Methodenlehre, die Kursteilnehmer 
verwenden können, um eine Ausgabe oder einem Thema in den Zeitungen, 
im Fernsehen oder im Radio über eine Zeitdauer von Zeit (1-2 Wochen) 
zu folgen und zu erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détails d'une méthodologie que les étudiants 
peuvent employer pour suivre et explorer une issue ou un sujet dans 
les journaux, la télévision ou la radio sur une certaine période de
temps (1-2 semaines).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Detalhes de uma metodologia que os estudantes 
possam usar seguir e explorar uma edição ou um tópico nos jornais, 
na televisão ou no rádio sobre um período de tempo (1-2 semanas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Particolari di una metodologia che gli allievi 
possono usare per seguire ed esplorare un'edizione o un soggetto in 
giornali, nella televisione o in radio per un periodo di tempo (1-2 
settimane).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπτομέρειες μιας μεθοδολογίας που οι σπουδαστές 
μπορούν να χρησιμοποιήσουν για να ακολουθήσουν και να ερευνήσουν 
ένα ζήτημα ή ένα θέμα στις εφημερίδες, την τηλεόραση ή το 
ραδιόφωνο για μια χρονική περίοδο (1-2 εβδομάδες).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <entry>4342</entry>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>

        <lifeCycle>

        <classification>
